Demographics.description: A single value describing key demographic information (e.g., age, gender, location, occupation).

About.description: A brief background or story about the persona.

Pains.description: An array of around ten different key frustrations or pain points of the persona, suitable for structured output in an API request.

Gains.description: An array of around ten different items describing what success or satisfaction looks like for the persona, suitable for structured output in an API request.

items.description: A specific gain or benefit desired.

Problem_Attitude.description: A short statement describing the persona's character in general and their attitude towards the problem they face. This should be a single paragraph of around 50 words that captures the essence of their mindset or approach to challenges.
